titles.title: Stop Unworthy Spending Act
SUSPEND Act
To amend title 31, United States Code, to consolidate suspension and debarment offices, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

committee.name: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform
